bug.author: foxlet7
bug.description:
Installed using Conda Run as Administrator Got AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.python.framework.ops' has no attribute 'RegisterShape' error When i tried to >python -m spleeter separate -i Test.mp3 -o output
<denchmark-h:h2>Output</denchmark-h>
AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.python.framework.ops' has no attribute 'RegisterShape' <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
OS Windows
Installation type Conda /
RAM available 8
Hardware spec CPU

comments.comment:
hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/foxlet7>@foxlet7</denchmark-link>
We've just recently moved to Tensorflow2. I don't know exactly what your issue was about but I hope it's now fixed in the latest spleeter version
